SEARCH
Module com.example.softmethproject4
Package com.example.softmethproject4

Class CurrentOrderController

java.lang.Object
com.example.softmethproject4.CurrentOrderController
public class CurrentOrderController extends Object
This class defines the controller for the CurrentOrderView. This method also defines all elements and attributes of the CurrentOrderView as well as any relevant methods that are invoked by button clicks or other actions by the user on the CurrentOrderView.
Author:
Adwait Ganguly, Kennan Guan

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected void
    clearOrder()
    This method clears the Order of pizzas from the current order when the user clicks the Clear Order button.
    protected void
    placeOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method places the current order of pizzas.
    protected void
    removePizza(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method removes a Pizza from the current order when the user selects a pizza from the order ListView and then selects the Remove button.

  • Constructor Details

    • CurrentOrderController

      public CurrentOrderController()

  • Method Details

    • removePizza

      protected void removePizza(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method removes a Pizza from the current order when the user selects a pizza from the order ListView and then selects the Remove button.
      Parameters:
      event - is the onClick event of the Remove button that invokes this method.

    • placeOrder

      protected void placeOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method places the current order of pizzas. This method is invoked when the user is satisfied with their order and selects the Place Order button on the CurrentOrderView.
      Parameters:
      event - is the onClick event of the Place Order button that invokes this method.

    • clearOrder

      protected void clearOrder()
      This method clears the Order of pizzas from the current order when the user clicks the Clear Order button. The ListView is cleared and the order price is back to zero.

    • setCurrentOrder

      public void setCurrentOrder(ArrayList<Pizza> pizzas)
      This method sets the current order based on an ArrayList of pizzas passed from the MainViewController. The ListView of pizzas is initialized based on this new ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      pizzas - is the ArrayList of pizzas in the current order that is passed from the MainViewController.

    • setOrderList

      public void setOrderList(ArrayList<Order> list)
      This method sets the ArrayList of all Orders that will be passed to the StoreOrderController.
      Parameters:
      list - is the list of all Orders that will be passed to the StoreOrderController.
